I need to deactivate the emails notifications to david@scaleyourmarketing.com

Sure, I can help you with that. To deactivate email notifications, please follow these steps:
1. Log in to your NewsBreak account.
2. Go to the 'Settings' section.
3. Navigate to 'Notification Settings'.
4. Here, you can turn off the email notifications.
If you need further assistance, feel free to ask!
Inside the ad manager, i want to pause the notifications  on newsbreak ads

Got it! To pause notifications in the NewsBreak Ad Manager, follow these steps:
1. Log in to your NewsBreak Ad Manager account.
2. Go to the 'Settings' section.
3. Navigate to 'Notification Settings'.
4. Here, you can pause or customize your notifications as needed.
If you need more detailed instructions, please let me know!
Buy where is the settings section? Is now showing on my ad manager

I apologize for the confusion. It seems like you might be having trouble locating the 'Settings' section in your Ad Manager. Let me guide you through it step-by-step:
1. Log in to your NewsBreak Ad Manager account.
2. On the top right corner, click on your profile icon or your company name.
3. A dropdown menu should appear, and you will see 'Settings' there.
4. Click on 'Settings' and then navigate to 'Notification Settings'.
5. Here, you can pause or customize your notifications as needed.
If you're still having trouble finding it, please let me know!
I'm still having trouble finding it
I'm sorry to hear that you're still having trouble. Let me send an email to our support team to assist you further with this issue.
Thank you. I'm trying to deactivate the notifications but the settings options isnt here.
I've sent an email to our support team to assist you further with this issue. They will get back to you shortly. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
